name: Shelly Nonemaker
text: Ordered 3 pzone and they were not that great. More dough n cheese than anything! Was not worth the money.

name: Emily Hall
text: Love stuff crust pizza and wings Bread sticks

name: Aaron Glantz
text: Delivered pizza to neighbor's house but made up for it by delivering free pizza. Great customer service

name: Venus Valentine
text:
So disappointed.  Customer service was great,  but how could the cook get my order wrong.  Like really..
A simple one at that.  Such a inconvenience to have to wait longer for my order.  The manager wasn't even able to offer a  A coupon for messing it up.
Next.

name: A Kow
text: The staff is always pleasant and the food is always good!

name: Jack Brown
text: Food excellent, staff superb,  prices really high.  But it is what it is.

name: Mike Shreckengast
text: Called in an order for on my lunch break 34 minutes before so it would be ready for pick up at 12. Drove to get my pizza only to find out it was apparently never put in the system or anything . Needless to say I didn't get lunch . Thanks pizza hut

name: Jody Hiney
text: Ordered delivery and my bill was $23.08 but when I checked my bank statement 2 days later they charged me double. Called them and was told this was normal and I would receive a credit to my account in 7-10 days. It made no sense to me and ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Workout
text: I had to update my review the last time we ordered pizza hut the food was Banging! We Got the 10 Dollar 3 meat pizza üçï Good and the Wings were Real Good üëç Good Job Pizza Hut.

name: Kristie Galentine
text: Good pizza. But it‚Äôs pricey!

name: Dain Kjelgaard
text: This was one of the cleanest and happiest pizza huts we have been to. The girls were wonderful. You have a great group of happy people who seem to get along and enjoy their jobs. We had a great pizza, wonderful service and wanted to say thank you.

name: Katheryn Williams
text: Delivers fast and really good quality food.

name: Jack Carrigan
text: Great people and good food

name: Brit Johnston
text: Excellent! I go here for pizza all the time. We always order the same thing and the staff remembers what we order. It's always  a pleasant experience.

name: Kyle Brown
text: My girlfriend and I ordered delivery from the new Mill Hall, Pennsylvania location. We ordered the big dinner box with two pizzas, cheese bread, and wings. The delivery girl arrived with the bag thrown over her shoulder and the box/bag was ‚Ä¶More

name: Becca S
text:
Wonderful staff and amazing food. Everything came out really hot and looked perfect.
Carly was our waitress and she always made sure we had drinks!
Overall this was a great experience.

name: Chip Laubscher
text: Hot coffee & cinnabons ... yum!  New location beside Arby's. Nice place. Friendly staff.

name: Betty Confer
text: Love the breadsticks. The lunch buffet is a good way to get a variety of the different types of pizza at an affordable price.

name: David Crust
text: I like the all-you-can-eat   Pizza hut during the week

name: Michele Whitney
text: The pizza is good but you have to fight to get a real pizza box to take your leftovers in and usually it's with some older salty waitress who's penny pinching for the establishment.  I have no idea what the logic is, probably because there ‚Ä¶More

name: Trish Hall
text: Our waitress was super nice n went above and beyond for us!

name: Tabitha Guerriero
text: Food was amazing, the music was enjoyable, staff were very kind and nice and our waitress Shania was very attentive, brought our food out hot fresh and very quickly made sure all of our needs were met, and also made sure everyone had a full ‚Ä¶More

name: Rob Woods
text: Good service.  The staff is usually pretty young, so they have been slow to check on you at your table.  Food has always been good.

name: Andrea Ilniski
text: Every time we visit and Lisa waits on us she is so amazing! She is awesome with the kids and always so nice

name: Tad Butler
text: I enjoyed the buffet... Good service good food.

name: nikki cooper
text: Kids love their pizza. Its out of the way for where I live but sometimes when Im in the area I stop in and order pizzas to bring home, the order is made quick everytime!

name: Jeffrey Gardner
text: Order carry out, seems like it took longer. Crust tastes different from dominoes, but pizza was good.

name: Tambra Pruey
text: I ordered 2 pizzas at 7:09 pm. She was very cortious explaining the specials whole needing to repeat herself cuz I was in a noisy environment. I made my order n didn't get there for over an hour yet the pizzas were hot n fresh as if I was there right on time. Very satisfied

name: Shawn Kinley
text: Very good lunch buffet, service was good and price is reasonable

name: Jason Koons
text: Bring back the lunch buffet

name: Heath Andrews
text:
Enjoyable visit & they took care of the one minor issue we had.
Side note: since cheese goes on top the pizza, how is it NOT considered a topping (extra cheese)?

name: George Closs

text: Pizza was great! Just wish they would bring the fruit pizza back to the buffet.

name: Jeff Nick

name: Kelly Rosh
text: Rocky is the best!  The wings are the bomb!  My favorite pizza all my life and it is always cooked perfectly!!!

name: Barbara Summers
text: After trying forever to order online and 3 calls to store themselves to get online prices decided to just call and order and pay regular menu price. Pizza was over cooked to where it was dry tasting. Grilled chicken had no flavor at all. Was not impressed at all.
